thread.title: Highly Profitable Online Based Business

title: Highly Profitable Online Based Business
text: Questions Business Summary This is a rare opportunity to own a very profitable online-based real estate investing training, info products and coaching business. Established in 2008, this business is an information leader, providing investors with the necessary knowledge, tools, and resources. They've developed and launched a diverse line of products to teach investors creative strategies and implementation technologies. The products are ''evergreen'' products that will have a long-term and broad appeal. Six distinct products are marketed, some as front-end and others as upsells. One of their products is a profitable coaching program for the serious investor. The coach is an active investor involved with tax liens, single family residences, and multi-family properties. He has been providing coaching services for over five years. Owners have long standing relationships with other vendors that completely understand the business, provide excellent service and produce great results. Seller has used same list vendor for 15 years, customer service for 12 years and the printing vendor for 7 years. They also use an outsourced sales team that provides a welcome call and upsells to other products. All outsourced vendors have assured the seller that they are very willing and eager to continue. The only W-2 employee is a part-time bookkeeper and this can also be outsourced. Sellers are active approximately 20 hours per week overseeing vendors and approving marketing campaigns. These proprietary products are promoted with proven Video Sales Letters, written sales letters, emails, sales scripts, direct mail pieces, and reports. Using Infusionsoft, they have garnered more than 71,000 contacts. They have established affiliate marketing promotions but much more could be done in this area. Call Maggie 619-890-0859 for Details. Asking Price$1,300,000 - Seller Financing Available:$650,000 DP; Balance SCN for 24 months at 6% interest. Financials
